title: NDTV World Summit: Access, Ambition, Attainment - 3 As For Women Inclusivity
content: At the NDTV World Summit, the conversation on women's inclusion in India's energy, logistics, and entrepreneurial sectors took centre stage with a sharp focus on the "3As" - Access, Ambition, and Attainment - as key drivers.
summary: At the NDTV World Summit, the conversation on women's inclusion in India's energy, logistics, and entrepreneurial sectors took centre stage with a sharp focus on the "3As" - Access, Ambition, and Attainment - as key drivers.

title: "Ratan Tata Remembered Promise Made In Passing Many Years Later": Kunal Bahl

title: NDTV World Summit: When Is Groww IPO Expected? CEO Lalit Keshre Answers

title: Climate Change And The "Trust Deficit" Between Developing, Developed Nations
content: Climate change is a global challenge and it must be seen as a common issue for the entire planet to work together on, but it is increasingly caught in the web of whose responsibility it is - the developed world or the developing world.

title: "Trying To Restore Trust": Army Chief On India-China Patrolling Deal
content: The Indian military is "trying to restore trust" in its Chinese counterpart, Chief of Army Staff General Upendra Dwivedi said Tuesday afternoon, a day after India and China reached a patrolling agreement along the Line of Actual Control.

title: Sundar Pichai On Why Google Invests So Heavily On Free Meals To Employees

title: UNSC Seat For India, G7's Diminishing Power: What Ex Diplomat Kishore Mahbubani Said
content: Former Singapore diplomat Kishore Mahbubani said it is time for Britain's permanent seat at the United Nations Security Council to be given to India. He also stressed India's role in addressing the conflict in Russia, Ukraine, Israel, among others.
